actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to provide that during a two-year period each item of any bill making appropriations that is agreed to by both Houses of the Congress in the same form shall be enrolled as a separate joint resolution for presentation to the President.

summary.text: Effects presidential line item veto authority by requiring that each item of any continuing appropriations bill that is agreed to in the same form by both the Senate and the House of Representatives be enrolled as a separate bill for presentation to the President.

titles.title: A bill to provide that during a two-year period each item of any bill making appropriations that is agreed to by both Houses of the Congress in the same form shall be enrolled as a separate joint resolution for presentation to the President.
